name: The Game Jam's Dark Side
description:
This is the game jam's dark side. Your one goal is to escape the loop.

Made for Mini Jam 113!

CONTROLS:

A & D - Move

Space - Jump / Confirm

W & S - Navigate Menu

CREDIT:

SFX, Music, Code, Art - Odiwa

Unity - Game Engine

Aseprite - Art

VSCode - Code

Ableton Live - Music

Audacity - SFX
